channel.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
channel.description: Yes yes I know, Game movies are most of the time terrible. However what would YOU do to make it better? Who would you cast for a movie based on a game? How would you do the film (in first person perhaps). Creativity tiem.

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: Piefish
item.description:
Daft-Life?

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Jack Black as Gordon Freeman
Michelle Rodriguez as Alyx
Chris Tucker as an anthropomorphized talking CGI Lamarr
Andy Serkis as D0G
Jim Carrey as Dr. Kleiner
Malcom MacDowell as Dr. Breen
Laurence Fishburne as Eli
Vince Vaughn as Barney
Christopher Walken as G-Man
John Cleese as Col. Odessa
Ian McKellen as Dr. Magnusson

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: Piefish
item.description:
I’d do it about Eli and Kleiner escaping from Black Mesa maybe with Barney.
But Gordon as the main character just wouldn’t work

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: Nerdinium
item.description:
wouldn’t it be better if it were made according to the HL2 story line ? There’s more space for creativity and workarounds if needed and /or plot twists/drama etc. Also in the first game Gordon is playing the role of a survivalist scraping by ,trying to get to the surface,if anything it would just turn into a disaster movie

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: RestlessMind
item.description:
I’d want it to involve the Black Mesa incident for sure.

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: nietzschesaurus
item.description:
actors != a good movie.

a convincing script, talented director, cinematographer, and editor do most of the heavy lifting. actors just play a part. good directors like tarintino can pull great performances out of no name hacks. so, let’s focus on how we’d want the movie to look/what kind of storyline/script we’d want instead.

also: robert downey jr is too busy being the planter’s peanut man.

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Agreed. And had Liam Neeson as one of the scientists. He could be one of the people who takes charge and helps people to the surface during the Resonance Cascade. At the end of the movie he is captured and executed by the HECU. In that way, the movie would be similar in tone and general flow to “Rome, Open City.” (an Italian neo-realist film from 1946. Really quite excellent, track down a copy if you can)

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
I think it would be better if the movie didn’t feature Freeman and instead focused on some other part of the HL universe.

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: RestlessMind
item.description:
I think Gordon would be best with a voice that isn’t particularly assumed to be “badass.” Something regular, kind of like some of the least nerdy/old man-sounding scientists in Black Mesa.

You wouldn’t expect a theoretical physicist to do what he does, so the voice would add to it.

Read full topic
item.source: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game

item.title: ITT: We create a cast for a movie based on a game
item.dc:creator: Piefish
item.description:
Bulletstorm movie anyone?

Grayson Hunt: hugh jackman
Ishi Sato: Daniel Dae Kim
Trishka Novak: Sandra Bullock

Edit: Also Gordon doesn’t wear a helmet, there is no evidence that he does, he is always depicted as not wearing one
/end
